### Checklist
- [ ] Will this be part of a product update? If yes, please update [Changelog](https://github.com/furiosa-ai/npu-tools/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).
- [ ] Changes are less than 1000 lines. ([Pull Request 크기 줄이는 법](https://github.com/furiosa-ai/npu-tools/blob/master/CodingConvention.md#pull-request-%ED%81%AC%EA%B8%B0-%EC%A4%84%EC%9D%B4%EB%8A%94-%EB%B2%95))
